ChangeList.Description: Enabled validation on the sender tenant ID for the [Update chatMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/update-chatmessage) operation. With this change, only the tenant of the user who sent the message can perform data loss prevention updates on the chat message; that is, change the **policyViolation** property on the chat message.

  • [Update app](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/teamsapp-update?view=graph-rest-beta)

Added the [members](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-post-members?view=graph-rest-1.0) navigation property to the [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type, enabling members to be added with increased reliability and lower latency.
Added delegated permissions support for [notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for channel and chat messages.

Added new permissions [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForTeam](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForTeam](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForTeam.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForTeam.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions).

Added [members](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-post-members?view=graph-rest-beta) navigation property to [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type, enabling members to be added with increased reliability and lower latency.

Added new delegated permissions [AppCatalog.Read.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#appcatalog-resource-permissions), [ChatMessage.Send](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#chatmessage-permissions), [Teams.Create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#teams-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForUser](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForUser](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelfForUser](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions).

Added new application permissions [Teams.Create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#teams-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadForUser.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteForUser.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions), [TeamsAppInstallation.ReadWriteSelfForUser.All](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#Teams-app-installation-permissions).

Added support for getting the [filesFolder](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-get-filesfolder?view=graph-rest-1.0) of a [channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-1.0).

Added [primaryChannel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-get-primarychannel?view=graph-rest-1.0) navigation property to [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the **azureADAppId** property to [teamsAppDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsAppDefinition?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added permissions for [resource-specific consent](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/permissions-reference#teams-resource-specific-consent-permissions).
Added support for sending [channel messages](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-1.0) and channel message replies.

Introduced the Shifts APIs, including [shift](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shift?view=graph-rest-1.0), [workforceintegration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workforceintegration?view=graph-rest-1.0), and associated methods.
Added new property **supportedEntities** to [workforceintegration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/workforceintegration?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added support for ChannelMessage.Read.All to APIs for reading [chatMessages](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta) in channels.
Added new entity [teamwork and communications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamworkandcommunications?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added [notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for all channel messages in tenant and all chat messages in tenant.
Added the [swapShiftsChangeRequest: decline](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/swapshiftschangerequest-decline?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the **swapShiftsChangeRequest** resource.
Added [notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for new and edited channel messages, and new and edited chat messages.
Added the [shiftpreferences](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shiftpreferences?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.
Added new relationship **shiftPreferences** to [userSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/usersettings?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Updated the application permissions required to perform read and write operations for shifts resources, including [schedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedule?view=graph-rest-beta), [schedulingGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedulinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta), [shift](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shift?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOff](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoff?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOffReason](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffreason?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOffRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffrequest?view=graph-rest-beta), [swapShiftChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/swapshiftchangerequest?view=graph-rest-beta), and [openShiftChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshiftchangerequest?view=graph-rest-beta). **Note:** Applications permissions are currently in private preview and are not available for public use.

Added the [openshift](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshift?view=graph-rest-beta), [openshiftChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshiftChangeRequest?view=graph-rest-beta), [swapShiftChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/swapShiftChangeRequest?view=graph-rest-beta), and [timeoffrequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffrequest?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.

Added the **timeClockEnabled**, **openShiftsEnabled**, **swapShiftsRequestsEnabled**, **offerShiftRequestsEnabled**,  **timeOffRequestsEnabled** properties to the [schedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedule?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added an additional route to retrieve a [driveItem] using a team and channel ID, [get driveItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/driveitem-get?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [Get team photo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilephoto-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Update team photo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilephoto-update?view=graph-rest-beta) methods.
[Reading images in messages](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessagehostedcontent-get?view=graph-rest-beta) now support application permissions.

Added the [primaryChannel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-get-primarychannel?view=graph-rest-beta) property to the [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **allowCreatePrivateChannels** property to the [teamMemberSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teammembersettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the ability to pull incremental messages from channels with the [channel messages delta query API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-messages-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).
